roleset.name: detach, open
roleset.note: UNLOCK-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls disassemble-23.3. (from unlock.01-v)
UNLOCKED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from unlocked.01-j)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: In 1953 , James Watson and his colleagues unlocked the double helix of DNA -LRB- deoxyribonucleic acid -RRB- , the genetic key to heredity .
example.arg: the double helix of DNA -LRB- deoxyribonucleic acid -RRB- , the genetic key to heredity

example.name: with attached things
example.text: John unlocked his bike from the bike rack.
